Context: Bob had a son that was named John. John owned the only red dog. There was a blue dog named Jim. The red dog was named Woof. John's mother and Bob's wife was named Gail. They all lived in a tree. There was a family down the street. They were a couple named Frank and Francine. Bob hated his neighbors. One day Bob went to Frank's house and threw toilet paper all over his trees. Frank got back at Bob by stealing his son's dog. This is how the long fight between Frank and Bob began. It lasted for ten years until Bob passed away from a bad heart attack. Frank knew he needed to say sorry to Bob's wife for the years of trouble. So Frank did apologize to Bob's wife. After this everything was great between the two families for the rest of their days on this Earth.
'Question': Who is Gail?
